item.description:
Are you a business that works exclusively in the nonprofit sector? Are you looking to grow partnerships to strengthen the social sector? Are you creative business owner or employee open to share new ideas with other socially responsible people? If you answered YES to any of these questions this unique Meetup is for you! The purpose of the group is to produce stronger relationships to speed positive change for the social sector. Meet other social entrepreneurs and local leaders who work to better the social impact of the nonprofit sector.

Schedule:
12noon-12:30pm -- Open Networking and FREE appetizers
12:30-1:00pm -- Intro of Nonprofit that is highlighted for the meeting and Individual Introductions to group
1:00--1:45 -- Three 15-minute discussions on topics of interest to our members (examples; success stories on partnerships, best practices for business development and marketing, providing solutions to major issues in the nonprofit sector space and how the group members can collectively help)
1:45-2pm -- More Networking!


The way this unique group seeks to grow and contribute:
1) Regular attendance (when possible)
2) Coming prepared to provide value to the group through new ideas, partnerships, and experience.
3) Create a learning environment that is fun and supportive!

SPONSORS:
If you want your company here...please email me!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Social Impact Circle meeting in back

group.name: Social Impact Success Community Meetup Group

item.name: Social Impact Circle meeting
